Distance.description: How far the player is from the target when swinging on it.

AnimationMaxSpeed.description: How fast the animation of the player swinging on the target is. Does not affect the speed you're launched with(?).

LaunchMaxSpeed.description: The maximum amount of speed this object can send you off with.

Acceleration.description: The player's acceleration while soaring through the air?

EndAngle.description: The angle the player will end up at after launching away from the target.

OutOfControl.description: How long the game locks your control for after swinging on the grapple point.

IsVisible.description: Whether this object is visible or not.

Targets.description: The objects affected by this event.

Type.description: What type of signal to send to each affected object.

Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.

Targets.description: The objects affected by this event.

Type.description: What type of signal to send to each affected object.

Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.

Targets.description: The objects affected by this event.

Type.description: What type of signal to send to each affected object.

Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.
